item.title: Home | PM4W
item.description: The PM4W project aims to improve water and sanitation in rural parts of Uganda by enabling access to information by various stakeholders and players in the Water and Sanitation sector. Using mobile phones baseline and inspection information is collected about each water point using the Ministry of Water and Environment guidelines and standards.
